Title: Move towards collectivization, happiness forever
Publisher: Sichuan renmin chubanshe (四川人民出版社)
Notes: The doves bring a medal to the model workers. The man has a book on production technology (生產技術l), the children hold posters; on the left one with a tractor, on the right one with an airplane spraying pesticide.
Theme: Land Reform and Collectivization (1950-1953)Door Gods (门神)
